title: Sammy's Big Change
description: In Sammy’s Big Change (from the Eggar and Sammy Series, book #2), Sammy and Eggar’s friendship withstands the challenge of change as the two improbable friends mature and learn from each other that “Everyone and everything changes. Change is one thing that we can count on.” Join Eggar and Sammy as they entertain and teach about two of life’s challenging lessons. Each book in the series includes “Eggstra Thoughts” and “Q and A” fact pages that can spark conversation and help readers enjoy more from their reading experience.
author: Sue  Garnett
